titles.title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 639) to amend title VII of the Tariff Act of 1930 to clarify that countervailing duties may be imposed to address subsidies relating to a fundamentally undervalued currency of any foreign country.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Motion to Discharge Committee filed by Mr. Critz. Petition No: 112-1.

bill.summary: 6/16/2011--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the resolution (H.Res. 310) to provide that countervailing duties may be imposed to address subsidies relating to the fundamentally undervalued currency of a foreign country.
